meanings.definition: Any of a group of hormones secreted within the brain and nervous system and having a number of physiological functions.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the effects of endorphins on the body.
meanings.sent3: When I exercise, my endorphins throw a party in my brain!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a rush of endorphins.
meanings.sent5: The endorphins flooded her system, washing away the pain.
